languages.text: "{name} фон Валанциус... Сие имя навсегда останется в архивах Дома Орселлио многовековой истории Империума. Ибо в переломный момент именно вы повлияли на судьбу нашего рода в Просторе... К добру или к худу". {n}Кассия коротко, но учтиво кивает.{/n} "Мы не всегда сходились во взглядах, однако сложно переоценить вклад вашей династии в разрешение внутренних конфликтов Дома Орселлио. Как новатор... я выражаю вам нашу благодарность".

traits.locale_text: "{name} фон Валанциус... Сие имя навсегда останется в архивах Дома Орселлио многовековой истории Империума. Ибо в переломный момент именно вы повлияли на судьбу нашего рода в Просторе... К добру или к худу". {n}Кассия коротко, но учтиво кивает.{/n} "Мы не всегда сходились во взглядах, однако сложно переоценить вклад вашей династии в разрешение внутренних конфликтов Дома Орселлио. Как новатор... я выражаю вам нашу благодарность".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."
languages.original_text: "{name} фон Валанциус... Сие имя навсегда останется в архивах Дома Орселлио многовековой истории Империума. К добру или к худу". {n}Кассия коротко, но учтиво кивает.{/n} "Мы не всегда сходились во взглядах, однако сложно переоценить вклад вашей династии в разрешение внутренних конфликтов Дома Орселлио. languages.text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯这个名字……将永远保存在奥赛罗家族横跨帝国无数世纪的档案库中。在关键时刻，你为我们家族在科罗努斯扩区的未来带来了至关重要的影响……无论会带来怎样的结果。”{n}卡西娅点了点头，以简短而礼貌的语气说道。{/n}“我们之间存在分歧，但你的家族帮助奥赛罗家族解决了我们的内部冲突，你的贡献非同小可。身为新任大族长……我谨代表家族全体成员向你致谢。”
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."

traits.locale_text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯这个名字……将永远保存在奥塞罗家族横跨帝国无数世纪的档案库中。在关键时刻，你为我们家族在科罗努斯扩区的未来带来了至关重要的影响……无论会带来怎样的结果。”{n}卡西娅点了点头，以简短而礼貌的语气说道。{/n}“我们之间存在分歧，但你的家族帮助奥塞罗家族解决了我们的内部冲突，你的贡献非同小可。身为新任大族长……我谨代表家族全体成员向你致谢。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: " von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."

languages.text: «{name} von Valancius... Ese nombre quedará grabado eternamente en los archivos de la casa Orsellio, cuyos registros engloban siglos de historia del Imperium. En un momento crucial, tuvo un papel esencial para el futuro de nuestra familia en la Extensión... para bien o para mal». {n}Cassia asiente de forma breve pero cortés.{/n} «Hemos tenido nuestras diferencias, pero su contribución a la resolución de los conflictos internos de la casa Orsellio es innegable. Como Novator... se lo agradezco en nombre de todos».
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."

traits.locale_text: «{name} von Valancius... Ese nombre quedará grabado eternamente en los archivos de la casa Orsellio, cuyos registros engloban siglos de historia del Imperium. En un momento crucial, tuvo un papel esencial para el futuro de nuestra familia en la Extensión... para bien o para mal». {n}Cassia asiente de forma breve pero cortés.{/n} «Hemos tenido nuestras diferencias, pero su contribución a la resolución de los conflictos internos de la casa Orsellio es innegable. Como Novator... se lo agradezco en nombre de todos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス…その名はオーセリオ家の書庫に永久に保存されるでしょう。その記録は帝国の何世紀もの歴史にわたって語られるでしょう。というのも、ある重要な瞬間に、あなたの存在がエクスパンスにおける私たち一族の未来に決定的な影響を及ぼしたからです…良くも悪くも」{n}カシアは無愛想に、しかし礼儀正しく頷いた。{/n}「意見の相違はありましたが、オーセリオ家の内紛解決に貢献されたことは間違いありません。ノベイターとして…その行動に御礼申し上げます」
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス…その名はオーセリオ家の書庫に永久に保存されるでしょう。その記録は帝国の何世紀もの歴史にわたって語られるでしょう。というのも、ある重要な瞬間に、あなたの存在がエクスパンスにおける私たち一族の未来に決定的な影響を及ぼしたからです…良くも悪くも」{n}カシアは無愛想に、しかし礼儀正しく頷いた。{/n}「意見の相違はありましたが、オーセリオ家の内紛解決に貢献されたことは間違いありません。ノベイターとして…その行動に御礼申し上げます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius ... Der Name wird auf ewig in den Archiven von Haus Orsellio bewahrt werden, deren Unterlagen die vielen Jahrhunderte der Geschichte des Imperiums umfassen. Denn in einem kritischen Augenblick Euer Einfluss der entscheidende für die Zukunft unserer Familie in der Ausdehnung ... Wie es auch enden mag." {n}Cassia nickt. Knapp, aber höflich.{/n} "Wir hatten unsere Differenzen, doch Eure Familie hat einen gewaltigen Beitrag zur Beilegung der internen Konflikte von Haus Orsellio geleistet. Als Novatorin ... danke ich Euch in unser aller Namen."
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius ... Der Name wird auf ewig in den Archiven von Haus Orsellio bewahrt werden, deren Unterlagen die vielen Jahrhunderte der Geschichte des Imperiums umfassen. Denn in einem kritischen Augenblick Euer Einfluss der entscheidende für die Zukunft unserer Familie in der Ausdehnung ... Wie es auch enden mag." {n}Cassia nickt. Knapp, aber höflich.{/n} "Wir hatten unsere Differenzen, doch Eure Familie hat einen gewaltigen Beitrag zur Beilegung der internen Konflikte von Haus Orsellio geleistet. Als Novatorin ... danke ich Euch in unser aller Namen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {name} von Valancius... Ce nom restera pour toujours gravé dans les archives de la maison Orsellio, qui couvrent l'histoire séculaire de l'Imperium, afin que nul n'ignore jamais l'influence cruciale que vous avez exercée sur l'avenir de notre famille dans les Étendues... pour le meilleur ou pour le pire. » {n}Cassia incline brièvement la tête, mais avec courtoisie.{/n} « Nous avons eu nos différends, vous et moi, mais grâce à votre famille, nous avons pu mettre un terme aux conflits internes qui déchiraient la maison Orsellio. En tant que Novator... je vous prie d'accepter nos plus sincères remerciements. »
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."

traits.locale_text: « {name} von Valancius... Ce nom restera pour toujours gravé dans les archives de la maison Orsellio, qui couvrent l'histoire séculaire de l'Imperium, afin que nul n'ignore jamais l'influence cruciale que vous avez exercée sur l'avenir de notre famille dans les Étendues... pour le meilleur ou pour le pire. » {n}Cassia incline brièvement la tête, mais avec courtoisie.{/n} « Nous avons eu nos différends, vous et moi, mais grâce à votre famille, nous avons pu mettre un terme aux conflits internes qui déchiraient la maison Orsellio. En tant que Novator... je vous prie d'accepter nos plus sincères remerciements. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius... Bu isim Orsellio Hanesi'nin arşivinde İmparatorluk tarihinin nice yüzyılını kapsayan kayıtlarda ebediyen yaşatılacak. En önemli anımızda, ailemizin Enginlik'teki geleceği üzerinde iyisiyle kötüsüyle mühim bir etki bıraktın." {n}Cassia, nazik bir şekilde kısaca başını sallıyor.{/n} "Anlaşamadığımız anlar oldu olmasına ama Orsellio Hanesi'nin iç çatışmasının çözülmesinde ailenin katkıları yadsınamaz. Rota Reisi olarak... Hepimiz adına sana teşekkür ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius... The name will be forever preserved in the archives of House Orsellio, whose records span the many centuries of the Imperium's history. For, at a critical moment, yours was the crucial influence on our family's future in the Expanse... For better or worse." {n}Cassia nods, curtly but courteously.{/n} "We have had our differences, but your family's contribution to the settling of House Orsellio's internal conflicts is hard to overstate. As the Novator... I thank you on behalf of us all."

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius... Orsellio Hanesi'nin arşivinde İmparatorluk tarihinin nice yüzyılını kapsayan kayıtlarda bu isim ebediyen yaşatılacak. Kritik bir an sırasında ailemizin Enginlik'teki geleceği üzerinde iyisiyle kötüsüyle önemli bir etki bıraktın." {n}Cassia, kısa ama nazik bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Anlaşamadığımız anlar oldu olmasına ama Orsellio Hanesi'nin iç çatışmasının çözülmesinde ailenin katkıları yadsınamaz. Rota Reisi olarak... Hepimiz adına sana teşekkür ediyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
